name: Perfectil Tablets
description: Perfectil Capsule is used for hair loss, acne, weak nails, hair fall, supplements, keshan disease, muscle cramps, biotin deficiency, skin and hair growth, anorexia and other conditions. Perfectil Capsule contains biotin, niacin, riboflavin, selenium and zinc as active ingredients. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
